title: Ticket #2748: Cruft in the procd_ctl output
description:
On master, there is currently cruft in the procd_ctl output (in stderr): 

[root@node097 ~]# procd_ctl -A /tmp/procd_pipe.STARTD SNAPSHOT
01/06/12 16:41:43 uname_opsys is Linux
01/06/12 16:41:43 Values for Linux opsys are:
 LINUX
 LINUX
 5
 507
 LINUX5
 Scientific Linux SL release 5.7 (Boron)

This may cause issues for tools parse the output of procd_ctl (but only if they include stderr). I know Dave Dykstra maintains a tool that calls procd_ctl, so I'm CC'ing him as a heads-up.
remarks:
2012-Jan-07 09:02:47 by matt:
See also #2744
attachments: • hush_uname.patch 1332 bytes added by bbockelm on 2012-Jan-07 19:23:02 UTC.
